text:
We are a partner that has been building an enterprise level website for a client.
One problem we have encountered is having multiple devs working on the project
I think <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/platform/developer-projects-setup> could be a solution but it is only available for ent sales or support my client has ent marketing ent cms pro sales pro support they are already spending alot with HubSpot to have to upgrade sales or support for this is a big ask any way of getting this functionality for this client?
developer projects wouldn't help at all with a website build
Are you possibly talking about the other projects which are used for project management?
Dev projects are for things like building out CRM card extensions

Oh right ok the problem we are having is we are building CMS Enterprise functionality using custom objects Serverless functions etc, and the limitation of a single sandbox means that we can only have one dev working on the project at any given time
dev projects wouldn't fix this issue though....
